name: Silver Lance
description:
My very first game, made in just Java, before even really knowing how to write code.

A kind-of-metroidvania, heavily influenced by Golden Axe, Dark Souls, Final Fantasy and even the Monty Python.

4 different characters with their own characteristics!  Breakable forniture! 

Controls: W,A,S,D for movement, SPACE to jump, K to attack.

It may be a shitty game with a shitty code, but I wanted to save it for its purely sentimental and nostalgic value.  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
